name: Magic Alliance
description:
"A champion has been chosen to prove himself".

Enter the realms of magic and navigate your way through treacherous obstacles and mazes! As your torchlight fades to does your chances of success. Featuring tracks from our album 'Journey Through the Unlight' Dark brooding atmospheres await!!!

 

Part 3 in the maze trilogy this game serves as a sequel to Caverns of Underwood and Dimsheller Maze.

32bit mac so NO Catalina and up. Supports PPC/Intel (Universal Binary)

Windows 2000 and up

64mb vram recommended.
